<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	$
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 4PX DOUBLE; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF" VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	-
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 4PX; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF" VALIGN="BOTTOM" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	$
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 4PX DOUBLE; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF" VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	342,924
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 4PX; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF" VALIGN="BOTTOM" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
	&#160;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	In May 2012, the Predecessor got in a dispute with Devil's Canyon Brewery ("DCB") over damage allegedly caused by the Predecessor to certain brewing tanks and related premises damage arising out of the Predecessor's use of DBC's facilities for brewing of its products.&#160; The Predecessor's insurance carrier paid for certain repairs which DCB subsequently contended were insufficient.&#160; Dissatisfied with the repairs, in September 2012, DCB filed a lawsuit against the Predecessor.&#160; The Predecessor vigorously defended the action while concurrently seeking to settle the action.&#160; Mediation and settlement conferences were unsuccessful and a jury trial commenced in October 2013.&#160; The jury found in favor of DCB's breach of contract claims and awarded damages in the amount of $130,700, which is recorded as reserve for legal settlement on the accompanying balance sheet as of December 31, 2013.&#160; The Predecessor's insurance carrier subsequently paid what it contended was its policy limits of $113,700 and the Predecessor paid the balance of the judgment in January 2014.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	In December 2013, DCB filed a motion for attorneys' fees seeking approximately $355,000.&#160; In January 2014, the Predecessor filed its own motion seeking approximately $234,000 in attorneys' fees contending that it should be designated the prevailing party in this action.&#160; In March 2014, the court denied the Predecessor's motion for attorneys' fees and granted DCB's motion for approximately $268,000, which the court later modified increasing the award in favor of DCB to $316,545.&#160; The Predecessor appealed to the court and the appeal remained pending as of December 31, 2014.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	During the three months ended March 31, 2015, the parties settled the case with the Predecessor agreeing to pay $275,000 in full and final settlement of the case.&#160; The Predecessor is indebted to its attorney for fees and costs in the amount of approximately $182,000 as of December 31, 2014, which is recorded as accounts payable on the accompanying balance sheets.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>

<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	F-19
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

	During the nine months ended December 31, 2015 (Successor), 1,479,290 shares of common stock were issued pursuant to the Acquisition (see Note 4).&#160; The Company estimated the fair market value to be $0.338 per share at the time of issuance.&#160; These shares were issued with "Price Protection" for a period of 18 months.&#160; If the market value of the common stock issued pursuant to the Acquisition is less than $500,000, the Company shall issue additional shares so the aggregate amount of shares issued in the Acquisition is equal to a market value of $500,000 based on the average closing bid price of the common stock for the five days prior thereto.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	As of December 31, 2015, 15,435,651 shares of common stock are issued and outstanding.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

	F-21

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	As of March 31, 2015 and December 31, 2014, the range of exercise prices of the outstanding options was $0.05 to $.25 per share.&#160; Of the total options outstanding, 375,042 options were granted at $0.05 per share and are fully vested as of December 31, 2014 and 500,000 options were granted at $.25 per share with a vesting rate of 6.25% per quarter from July 14, 2014.&#160; The relative fair value of the options was determined to be nominal.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	During the year ended December 31, 2014,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	the Predecessor issued an aggregate of 60,000 common stock warrants to purchase shares of common stock at $0.01
</FONT>
	i
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	n connection with borrowings from related party shareholders and officers of the Predecessor. The relative fair value of the common stock warrants was determined to be nominal.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	NOTE 14 &#8211; COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Legal Matter (Predecessor)
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	As discussed in Note 10, during the year ended December 31, 2014, the Predecessor was involved in a lawsuit
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	over damage allegedly caused by the
</FONT>
	Predecessor
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	to certain brewing tanks and related premises damage.&#160; The
</FONT>
	Predecessor
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	eventually lost on the matter.&#160; During the three months ended March 31, 2015, the parties settled the case with the
</FONT>
	Predecessor
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	agreeing to pay $275,000 in full and final settlement of the case.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Operating Lease Commitments
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Effective April 1, 2015, the Company assumed a facilities lease with a third party for the manufacture of its b&#250;cha&#174; Live Kombucha tea.&#160; This lease was executed in August 31, 2013 with a lease term of 31 months, expiring February 29, 2016.&#160; In September 2015, the Company extended the facilities lease for 39 months effective March 1, 2016 and expiring May 31, 2019.&#160; The monthly base rent is $2,795 for first 12 months, $2,879 for next 12 months, $2,965 for next 12 months, and $3.054 for the balance of the term.&#160; Monthly rent payments also include common area maintenance charges, taxes, and other charges.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Future minimum lease payments under this facilities lease are approximately as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	NOTES TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Rent expense operations was $37,900, $8,250 and $32,800 for the nine months ended December 31, 2015 (Successor), the three months ended March 31, 2015 (Predecessor), and the year ended December 31, 2014 (Predecessor), respectively.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Legal
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	In the normal course of business, the Company may be involved in legal proceedings, claims and assessments arising in the ordinary course of business.&#160; Such matters are subject to many uncertainties, and outcomes are not predictable with assurance.&#160; There are no such matters that are deemed material to the financial statements as of December 31, 2015.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	NOTE 15 &#8211; SEGMENT INFORMATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	The Company follows segment reporting in accordance with FASB ASC Topic 280,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Segment Reporting
</FONT>
	.&#160; Prior to October 1, 2015, the Company's brewery operations were classified into two operating segments; "retail," to retail customers through the Company's tasting room located in the greater Seattle, Washington area, and "wholesale," to distributors under various distributor agreements.&#160; Although both segments are involved in the sale and distribution of beer, they serve different customers and are managed separately, requiring specialized expertise.&#160; As discussed in Note 3, on October 1, 2015, the Company sold its assets and various liabilities related to its brewery and micro-brewing operations.&#160; The Company recognized the sale of its brewery and micro-brewing operations as a discontinued operation in the accompanying financial statements.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	As discussed in Note 4, effective April 1, 2015, the Company also manufactures and sells b&#250;cha&#174; Live Kombucha, a gluten free, organic certified, sparkling kombucha tea.&#160; The kombucha tea brand serves different customers and is managed separately, requiring specialized expertise.&#160; Prior to October 1, 2015, the Company also reported it kombucha tea business as an operating segment.&#160; However, with the sale of the Company's brewery and micro-brewing operations, the Company now operates in one segment, that of b&#250;cha&#174; Live Kombucha tea business.&#160; Accordingly, no further segment reporting is required as of December 31, 2015 and for the period then ended.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>

	F-24
</DIV>

	AMERICAN BREWING COMPANY, INC.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	NOTES TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	NOTE 16 &#8211; INCOME TAXES
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Successor
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	The Company net operating loss carry-forwards available to reduce future taxable income. Future tax benefits for these net operating loss carry-forwards are recognized to the extent that realization of these benefits is considered more likely than not.&#160; To the extent that we will not realize a future tax benefit, a valuation allowance is established.&#160; The tax effects of temporary differences that give rise to significant portions of the deferred tax assets and deferred tax liabilities are presented below:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Predecessor
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	The Predecessor is a limited liability corporation and is classified as a partnership for income tax purposes.&#160; The Predecessor profits and losses are reportable by the members on their respective income tax returns.&#160; Accordingly, no provision for income taxes has been reflected in these financial statements.&#160; The Predecessor has no unrecognized tax benefits as of December 31, 2014 (Predecessor.)
</DIV>

<EFX_SUBSEQUENT_EVENTS>
<A NAME="FIS_SUBSEQUENT_EVENTS"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	NOTE 17 &#8211; SUBSEQUENT EVENTS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Sale of Convertible Promissory Note
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	On March 19, 2016, the Company entered into a Securities Purchase Agreement with an unaffiliated third party, whereby the Company sold a Convertible Promissory Note in an amount of $200,000.&#160; The purchaser also received a three-year Warrant to purchase 100,000 shares at an exercise price of $0.40 per share.&#160; The Convertible Promissory Note is convertible after 180 days into shares of the Company's common stock at a twenty-five percent (25%) discount to the Volume Weighted Average Price for the five (5) trading days prior to the date of conversion.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF">
	The securities were sold in reliance upon exemptions from registration pursuant to Section 4(a)(2) and Section 4(6) under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Management Changes
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Effective March 24, 2016, our Chief Executive Officer and President, Neil Fallon, was promoted to serve as Executive Chairman of the board of directors of the Company.&#160; Also on that same date, Brent Willis was appointed to serve as interim Chief Executive Officer, interim Chief Financial Officer, and as a Director of the Company.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Name Change
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	On March 30, 2016, the board of directors recommended that the Company amend its articles of incorporation to change its name from American Brewing Company, Inc. to B&#250;cha, Inc., and to effect a change to its public stock symbol.&#160; Also on March 30, 2016, the majority shareholders acting by majority consent approved the name change.&#160; The Company intends to file the necessary state and regulatory documents to effect the name change.
</DIV>
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO SECTION 302
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;I, Brent Willis, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	1)&#160;&#160;&#160;I have reviewed this annual report of American Brewing Company, Inc. on Form 10-K;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	2)&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	3)&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	4)&#160;&#160;&#160; I am responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))&#160;&#160;for the Registrant and have;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>

	(a)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="7970850875C24860B19BCA1AF41F072B" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	(a)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Registrant's ability to record, process summarize and report financial information; and

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

</DIV>
<TABLE ID="AAE973A554CB4502AAA9C7964F28FADC" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

	(b)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Registrant's internal controls over financial reporting.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31_2"></A>
<DIV>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;&#160;Exhibit 31.2
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO SECTION 302
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;I, Brent Willis, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	1)&#160;&#160;&#160;I have reviewed this annual report of American Brewing Company, Inc. on Form 10-K;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	2)&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	3)&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	4)&#160;&#160;&#160; I am responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))&#160;&#160;for the Registrant and have;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="F38EEDF4F7EA45588DDD586634671FF8" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(a)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure the material information relating to the Registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="D4C39AE5886B479FA5C95CA60747B182" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(b)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="FDE19C7394914ED6B91AE7DA74393742" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(c)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the Registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="577FB0CB06C04AD9BAA8FAE2419B54A0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(d)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	5)&#160;&#160;&#160;I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the Registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the Registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="9E9557E5BB5A46AEBC3FF588AC6D6917" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(a)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Registrant's ability to record, process summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="49F6DA9CD9324383BEE85A2DF6073048" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(b)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 85.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Registrant's internal controls over financial reporting.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="69299AD85CBB4941B149C1BBA078ACF1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT 0F 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	In connection with the Annual Report of American Brewing Company, Inc. (the Company") on Form 10-K for the period ended herein as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the "Report"), I. Brent Willis, Interim Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. ss.1350, as adopted pursuant to ss.906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="28DB0A9A57A84B0ABDFF40241143D1A5" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 7.69%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 8.97%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(1)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 83.34%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="9A5AC620633D4FBC8CFB82A8DC06C732" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 7.69%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 8.97%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(2)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 83.34%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	The information contained in the Report fully presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations or the Company.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<TABLE ID="1C59293FE4F8465795DF95F3458CC818" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 39.74%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6.42%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 53.84%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	American Brewing Company, Inc.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	In connection with the Annual Report of American Brewing Company, Inc. (the Company") on Form 10-K for the period ended herein as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the "Report"), I. Brent Willis, Interim Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. ss.1350, as adopted pursuant to ss.906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>

	(1)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 83.34%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
